name: Send GET request to Lorem Picsum API

testSteps.description: 1: Send GET request to Lorem Picsum API ({endpoint=/v2/list, code=200})

children.description: Given I want to get a list of images from Lorem Picsum
When I send a GET request to the endpoint "/v2/list"
user executes a GET on the resource /v2/list

children.description: Then I validate that the response code is "200"
Then The response code is should be '200'
And I validate that the response contains a list of images with the correct attributes
Then The response contains images should be a collection with size a value greater than (0)
Then The first image has an 'id' field should be not null
Then The first image has an 'author' field should be not null
Then The first image has a 'download_url' field should be not null
